title: Best of The Program | Guest: Jerry Wayne | 3/12/20
description:
Coronavirus update: This doesn’t look like a seasonal virus. President Trump closed down travel from Europe, the NBA suspended its season, schools are closing across the nation, and the stock market was frozen for the second time in a week. But China is back up and running, hopefully for good. And Jerry Wayne, the Michigan worker who confronted Joe Biden over gun control, calls in to tell the full story.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: Best of The Program | Guest: Jerry Wayne | 3/12/20
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
itunes:subtitle: Coronavirus doesn’t look like a seasonal virus, but it can still be contained with the right precautions.
